review: Worked great for a week, now Hulu and hbo go are glitchy, and the games randomly stop working
author: James gleckner

review: This one is for my daughter's room. Set up is so easy, wish everything was that simple. Remote is so simple my 5 year old can work it, with parental controls for fire stick and netflix she can watch tv made for her. This is our second one. My older daughter got one for her bedroom first. Great purchase!
author: Mitchell L

review: It works very nice I like it
author: Mohamed

review: LOVE IT! We have apple tv and roku and the fire stick is our favorite!! My 4 year old keeps asking to watch the "fire tv stick". The user interface is pretty and intuitive and it pulls up the things you are watching which helps if you binge watch a show from time to time. I can see us buying one for every room. :)
author: hannfam

review: Don't know how i've gone this long without it...
author: chalmers519

review: Didn't work with our wireless set-up. It would read for about 5 minutes, then lose signal. Gave it to a friend with a compatible wireless system.
author: Travis Knight "The Weaving Knight!"

review: amazon fire  tv stick  ...is my favorite....you can say good bye to Dish network....  for $ 39 bucks you cant beat it... this is a great buy for all you get... everyone needs to try the Amazon Fire Tv Stick
